PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI: :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JOB :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# <> "Standalone" OR "Managed Domain" : PRINT "&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# must be either Standalone or Managed Domain" : EXIT 1 :ENDIF

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_CLI@UNIX
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Standalone" : SET &START_JBOSS_COMMAND# = 'nohup "&UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME#/bin/standalone.sh"' :ELSE : SET &START_JBOSS_COMMAND# = 'nohup "&UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME#/bin/domain.sh"'
: IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOST_CONFIG_FILE# NE "" : SET &START_JBOSS_COMMAND# = '&START_JBOSS_COMMAND# --host-config="&UC4RB_JBOSS_HOST_CONFIG_FILE#"' : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_PC_ADDR# NE "" : SET &START_JBOSS_COMMAND# = '&START_JBOSS_COMMAND# --pc-address=&UC4RB_JBOSS_PC_ADDR#' : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_PC_PORT# NE "" : SET &START_JBOSS_COMMAND# = '&START_JBOSS_COMMAND# --pc-port=&UC4RB_JBOSS_PC_PORT#' : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_INTERPROCESS_ADDR# NE "" : SET &START_JBOSS_COMMAND# = '&START_JBOSS_COMMAND# --interprocess-hc-address=&UC4RB_JBOSS_INTERPROCESS_ADDR#' : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_INTERPROCESS_PORT# NE "" : SET &START_JBOSS_COMMAND# = '&START_JBOSS_COMMAND# --interprocess-hc-port=&UC4RB_JBOSS_INTERPROCESS_PORT#' : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SYSTEM_PROPS# NE "" : DEFINE &SYSTEM_PROPS#,string, 100 : FILL &SYSTEM_PROPS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_SYSTEM_PROPS#,",") : SET &VAR# = 1 : WHILE &SYSTEM_PROPS#[&VAR#] NE "" : SET &SYSTEM_PROP# = STR_TRIM(&SYSTEM_PROPS#[&VAR#]) : SET &START_JBOSS_COMMAND# = "&START_JBOSS_COMMAND# -D&SYSTEM_PROP#" : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_CONFIG_FILE# NE "" : SET &START_JBOSS_COMMAND# = '&START_JBOSS_COMMAND# -c="&UC4RB_JBOSS_CONFIG_FILE#"' :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_ADMIN_ONLY# EQ "YES" : SET &START_JBOSS_COMMAND# = '&START_JBOSS_COMMAND# --admin-only' :ENDIF
:SET &START_JBOSS_COMMAND# = '&START_JBOSS_COMMAND# &'
!Escaped jboss-cli.sh set NOPAUSE="True"
!Used when Host Controller is not defined export HC=""
FailIfRunning() { : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_FAIL_RUNNING# = "YES" exit 1; : ELSE exit 0; : ENDIF }
!---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IsServerRunning() { isServerRunning=""
output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="/host=$HC/server-config=$1:read-attribute(name=status)"` RC=$?
echo "$output" | grep -v "ARATools\|Version\:\|Date\:\|GmbH" if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then exit $RC; fi
if [ "`echo "$output" | grep '\"success\"'`" ]; then isServerRunning=`echo "$output" | grep "\"STARTED\""` else echo "Could not get information from $1 of host $HC. Aborting ..." exit 1 fi
if [ "$isServerRunning" ]; then return 1 else return 0 fi } !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IsJBossRunning() {
output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="quit" | grep "Failed to connect to the controller"` if [ -z "$output" ]; then echo "JBoss is running." fi }
!---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- StartJBossEAP() { echo "Checking if JBoss(&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE#) is running ..." if [ "`IsJBossRunning`" ]; then echo "JBoss Server (&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE#) is already running. Aborting ..." FailIfRunning fi
echo "JBoss is not running. Starting JBoss EAP 7 (&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE#) ..." : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVICE_NAME# EQ "" echo "Trying to start using standalone.sh/domain.sh ..." &START_JBOSS_COMMAND# : ELSE echo "Trying to start service &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVICE_NAME# ..." "&UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVICE_NAME#" stop : ENDIF : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
sleep &UC4RB_JBOSS_TIMEOUT# : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
echo "Checking JBoss EAP 7 state ..."
if [ "`IsJBossRunning`" ]; then echo "JBoss (&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE#) has been successfully started." exit 0 else echo "Failed to start JBoss. Aborting ..." exit 1 fi }
!----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
cd "&UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME#/bin" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Standalone" StartJBossEAP :ELSE
: IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER# = "" StartJBossEAP : ELSE if [ -z "`IsJBossRunning`" ]; then echo "JBoss Domain Controller must be running to start servers inside the domain. Aborting ..." exit 1 fi
: IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOST_CONTROLLER# EQ "" ! Find the local host controller (domain controller) output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command=":read-attribute(name=local-host-name)" | grep '\"result\" =>'` HC=`echo "$output" | awk 'BEGIN { FS="\""} {print $4}'` echo "JBoss host controller is not defined. Use local host controller: $HC" : ELSE HC="&UC4RB_JBOSS_HOST_CONTROLLER#" : ENDIF
! Server instances are separated by commas. Only trying to start if all server instances are not running. : DEFINE &SERVERS#, string, 100 : FILL &SERVERS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER#,",")
: SET &VAR# = 1 : WHILE &SERVERS#[&VAR#] NE "" : SET &SERVER# = STR_TRIM(&SERVERS#[&VAR#]) echo "Checking server instance: &SERVER# status ..."
IsServerRunning &SERVER# if [ $? = 1 ]; then echo "Server instance: &SERVER# is already running. Aborting ..." FailIfRunning else echo "Server instance: &SERVER# is not running." fi : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE
: SET &VAR# = 1 : WHILE &SERVERS#[&VAR#] NE "" : SET &SERVER# = STR_TRIM(&SERVERS#[&VAR#]) echo "Starting &SERVER# using JBoss CLI ..." output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="/host=$HC/server-config=&SERVER#:start"` RC=$? echo "$output" | grep -v "ARATools\|Version\:\|Date\:\|GmbH" if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then exit $RC; fi
sleep &UC4RB_JBOSS_TIMEOUT# : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
echo "Checking server instance: &SERVER# status again ..."
IsServerRunning &SERVER# if [ $? = 0 ]; then echo "Failed to start &SERVER#. Aborting ..." exit 1 else echo "&SERVER# has been successfully started." fi
: SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE : ENDIF :ENDIF

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"* has been successfully started.") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_STARTED# = "TRUE" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_STARTED#,,"WORKFLOW"
:ENDPROCESS
